subject: Re: Stella - Travel pages to update

action.text: Chris Paradowski assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
Hi,

Apologies for the back and forth changes -

We have updated the disclaimer again and changed the hyperlinks in the 'new hidden' disclaimer. Can you please update it?

Stella Comprehensive Car Insurance is issued and underwritten by QBE Insurance (Australia) Limited (ABN 78 003 191 035, AFSL 239545) (QBE) and distributed by Stella Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 72633811319) acting as an Authorised Representative (AR 001282046) of Insurtech Gateway Australia Pty Ltd (ABN 27 633 140 879, AFSL 525866), which is acting under its own AFSL on behalf of QBE.

Stella Travel Insurance is issued by Pacific International Insurance Pty Ltd (ABN 83 169 311 193) (Pacific) and distributed by Stella Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 72 633 811 319, AR 001282046) acting as an Authorised Representative of battleface Insurance Services Pty Ltd (ABN 28 650 606 045, AFSL 536280) (battleface) which is acting under a binding authority as agent for Pacific.

Stella Pet Insurance is issued by Pacific International Insurance Pty Ltd (ABN 83 169 311 193) (Pacific) and distributed by Stella Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 72 633 811 319, AR 001282046) acting as an Authorised Representative of Knose Financial Services Pty Ltd (ABN 38 620 795 735, AFSL 536651) (Knose), which is acting under a binding authority as agent for Pacific.

Any advice provided is general only and has been prepared without taking into account your objectives, financial situation or needs and may not be right for you. Benefits are subject to the terms and conditions including the limits, sub-limits and exclusions of the insurance policy. You should consider the appropriateness of any such advice, and read the Product Disclosure Statement (PDS), the Target Market Determination (TMD) and Financial Services Guide (FSG) for these products, before making a decision to acquire, or to continue to hold, the product.

Thanks a lot,
Vivian



Vivian Yeung

@ricaR +15 mins from me as well on this one.

Hi Vivian, 

Great news, we have completed the requested updates. 

This includes updating the anchor links on https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/faq-inc-travel/

done with the request except for the first and last one. please check @chris 
15min

Hi Chris, Sounds good - we will let you know once Travel is ready to go live and we can swap the disclaimer. Was just going through the pages for a final check and please see comments below for update - On nav tab:
  • "Make a claim" button is not linking to https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/travel-insurance/claims/
On /travel-insurance/claims/ page:
  • Remove this line for now as the Claim form is not ready yet "If you're ready to start your claim, you can start here [link to claim form]."
  • Add this line above the 2x call buttons. We want to show the phone numbers on the page in case people can't click the call buttons. Wherever you are you can call our friendly claims team on +61 2 7202 0824 from overseas or 1300 633 811 within Australia 24/7.
On /faq-inc-travel/ page:
  • Can you confirm if the URL is going to be /help/ and replace the current /help/ page when Travel launches?
  • Will 'Car' and 'Pet' anchor links be updated? Currently only 'Travel' button is working
  • Unsure what this grey star is for and can this be removed?
  • Insert 'Stella Hub' link (my account) in these 2x FAQs under Policy?
    • Can I make changes or cancel my policy?
    • Can I extend my policy if I plan to travel longer?
Thanks, Vivian Vivian Yeung Brand & Campaign Marketing Manager Level 13, 50 Pitt St, Sydney NSW 2000 m 0470 416 709 e vivian@stellainsurance.com.au w http://stellainsurance.com.au/

Hi Vivian, 

Got it! Without getting too specific, we have updated the disclaimer in way that will ensure it is up to date now, and also prepared for launch. 

The screenshot shows 2 versions of the disclaimer, the current live disclaimer as well as the hidden 'new' disclaimer. When instructed by you, we will revert to the new disclaimer. 

We are standing by for further updates.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

I think we're close! Just 2 things on the disclaimer in the footer:

Can we update the brand disclaimer to the below?

WeMoney Insurance Awards 2023: Winner - Car Insurer of the Year, Outstanding Claims Experience (Car Insurance), Best Quality Car Insurance (Car Insurance), and Outstanding Customer Experience (Pet Insurance) awards.

Stella Comprehensive Car Insurance is issued and underwritten by QBE Insurance (Australia) Limited (ABN 78 003 191 035, AFSL 239545) (QBE) and distributed by Stella Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 72633811319) acting as an Authorised Representative (AR 001282046) of Insurtech Gateway Australia Pty Ltd (ABN 27 633 140 879, AFSL 525866), which is acting under its own AFSL on behalf of QBE.

Stella Travel Insurance is issued by Pacific International Insurance Pty Ltd (ABN 83 169 311 193) (Pacific) and distributed by Stella Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 72 633 811 319, AR 001282046) acting as an Authorised Representative of battleface Insurance Services Pty Ltd (ABN 28 650 606 045, AFSL 536280) (battleface) which is acting under a binding authority as agent for Pacific.

Stella Pet Insurance is issued by Pacific International Insurance Pty Ltd (ABN 83 169 311 193, AFSL 523921) (Pacific) and distributed by Stella Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 72 633 811 319, AR 001282046) acting as an Authorised Representative of Knose Financial Services Pty Ltd (ABN 38 620 795 735, AFSL 536651) ('Knose'), which is acting under a binding authority as agent for Pacific.

Any information or advice provided on this site is general only and has been prepared without taking into account your objectives, financial situation or needs and may not be right for you. Benefits are subject to the terms and conditions including the limits and exclusions of the insurance policy. You should consider the appropriateness of any such advice, and read the Product Disclosure Statement ('PDS'), the Target Market Determination ('TMD') and Financial Services Guide ('FSG') for these products available at www.stellainsurance.com.au before making a decision to acquire, or to continue to hold, the product.

Also, it looks like the new disclaimer is on the live site. Can you please hide it if this was the case?

Will share more final feedback shortly if I receive any from the team.

Thanks,
Vivian



Vivian Yeung
